sentences.en: But Hester could not resolve the query , using herself in a dismal labyrinth of doubt.
sentences.cn: 对这一逼问,海丝特可没法作答了, 因为连她自己也尚在阴暗的迷宫中徘徊呢.

sentences.en: It becomes apparent that there is a perfect labyrinth of possible questions and possible answers.

sentences.en: The badger sett had twelve entrances to what must have been a labyrinth of tunnels.
